message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is perfectly aligned with your needs and expectations. Given its value and quality, I propose an initial price of $15000. This offer includes all the features you're looking for and more, ensuring a seamless experience. Please let me know if this proposal meets your considerations, or if you have any specific requirements that we can address.

Alice, thank you for your offer, but $15000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm really interested in this product and I'm willing to pay up to $12000 for it.  Let me know if that's something you're willing to consider.
